mapper.insert: insert into submissions(email, username, pid, title submitTime, state, normalSubmit, timeUsed, memoryUsed, info) values ('${email}', '${username}' '${pid}', '${title}', '${submitTime}', '${state}', ${normalSubmit}, 0, 0, '')
mapper.update: update submissions set state = '${state}', timeUsed = ${timeUsed}, memoryUsed = ${memoryUsed}, info = '${info}' where email = '${email}' and pid = '${pid}' and submitTime = '${submitTime}'
